TEST.0.title: 2024 North Carolina Division C Regional 1
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

 
 
 
School Name:

Check your team:  ◻ Varsity     ◻ JV1      JV2     ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: One of the chief triumphs of modern mathematics consists in having discovered what mathematics really is.
CIPHER.1.question: The following quote by Bertrand Russell has been encoded as an Aristocrat for you to solve.  What did they say?
CIPHER.1.author: Andy Rooney

CIPHER.19.cipherString: Apparently, saying "Wow, you've grown since I last saw you" isn't deemed socially acceptable when said to adults.
CIPHER.19.question: Some life learning has been encoded using a Complete Columnar cipher.  You are told that the word GROWN appears somewhere in the cipher text.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.19.author: Unknown

CIPHER.20.cipherString: I try to stay in a constant state of confusion just because of the expression it leaves on my face.
CIPHER.20.question: A quote by Johnny Depp has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What did they say?
CIPHER.20.author: Johnny Depp

CIPHER.17.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 940687 23175. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.13.cipherString: Until you understand a writer's ignorance, presume yourself ignorant of his understanding.
CIPHER.13.question: A quote by Samuel Taylor Coleridge has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that one of the words is YOU and that THE does not appear in the text.
CIPHER.13.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge 1772-1834

CIPHER.15.question: Decode the following German Proverb which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of DOWN.
CIPHER.15.author: German Proverb

CIPHER.6.cipherString: Every grate jeanus haz uh special vocashun, and wehn he has fulfilled it, he is no longer knee dead.
CIPHER.6.question: A friend of yours who can't spell very well has taken a very old quote from Goeth, typed it in (mistakes and all) and then encoded it as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What did they actually encode?

CIPHER.7.cipherString: We may have all come on different ships, but we're in the same boat now.
CIPHER.7.question: The following quote by Martin Luther King Jr. needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of SWIM
CIPHER.7.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

CIPHER.145.cipherString: In many ways, being happy is the culmination of many other states of being, such as feeling calm, pleasure, satisfaction, and joy.
CIPHER.145.question: A quote by Alex A. Lluch has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the letter D decodes to be E.
CIPHER.145.author: Alex A. Lluch

CIPHER.10.cipherString: This world is a beautiful book, but of little use to him who cannot read it.
CIPHER.10.question: A quote by Goldoni has been encoded using the Complete Columnar cipher.  We are told that the word LITTLE appears somewhere in the text.
CIPHER.10.author: Goldoni

CIPHER.8.cipherString: Most men make little other use of their speech than to give evidence against their own understanding.
CIPHER.8.question: A quote by George Savile has been encoded using the K3 Aristocrat Cipher using a key phrase.  What was the key phrase used to encode the cipher?
CIPHER.8.author: George Savile, Marquis of Halifax 1633-95

CIPHER.9.cipherString: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
CIPHER.9.question: The following quote by Paulo Coelho needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitition Cipher with a keyword of HELP and polybius key of IMPORTANCE.
CIPHER.9.author: Paulo Coelho

CIPHER.3.cipherString: I was talking aloud to myself. A habit of the old: they choose the wisest person present to speak to
CIPHER.3.question: A quote by J.R.R. Tolkien has been encoded as an Aristocrat.  The word THE appears twice in the quote.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.3.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

CIPHER.16.cipherString: The future promises, it is the present that pays
CIPHER.16.question: The following symbols are a Baconian Cipher encoding of a quote by Gustave Droz.  What did they say?
CIPHER.16.author: Gustave Droz

CIPHER.11.cipherString: The trouble with unemployment is that the minute you wake up in the morning you're on the job.
CIPHER.11.question: An observation has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K2 alphabet.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.11.author: Unknown

CIPHER.2.cipherString: All I know is just what I read in the papers, and that's an alibi for my ignorance.
CIPHER.2.question: The following quote by Will Rogers needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitition Cipher with a keyword of READ and polybius key of OBSERVING.
CIPHER.2.author: Will Rogers

CIPHER.18.cipherString: Es muy bueno quedarse a solas con la verdad a veces, escuchar con toda su severidad lo que le dirá a uno.
CIPHER.18.question: The following quote from Carlyle has been translated into Spanish and encoded as a Xenocrypt using a K1 Alphabet with an English Keyword.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.18.author: Carlyle.
CIPHER.18.translation: It is very good to be left alone with the truth sometimes, to hear with all its sternness what it will say to one.

CIPHER.14.cipherString: Tomorrow belongs to those who can hear it coming
CIPHER.14.question: A quote by David Bowie has been encoded as a Baconian cipher.  What did they say?
CIPHER.14.author: David Bowie

CIPHER.12.cipherString: Genius is nothing but a great capacity for patience.
CIPHER.12.question: A quote by Buffon has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has NOTHING in it corresponding to the encoded text T J K A N Q U Y.
CIPHER.12.author: Buffon.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: When all is said and done, more is said than done.
CIPHER.5.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Lou Holtz using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text starts with WHEN
CIPHER.5.author: Lou Holtz

CIPHER.4.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 5176130 76839. What do they decode to?
